functional.notes: Minimal unit tests exist for manifest determinism and contract bounds/validation.
findings: Determinism test asserts stable artifact ordering.
Contract tests cover confidence and WGS84 bounds.

correctness_safety.notes: Tests provide regression coverage for key contract invariants.
findings: Prevents accidental drift in validation logic.

performance.notes: Tests are small/fast and should remain CI-friendly.
findings: No heavy fixtures or external dependencies.

security.notes: No network access required; tests do not execute external commands.

maintainability.notes: Tests target high-value invariants and are readable.
findings: Extensible pattern for adding future contract tests.

summary.notes: Good baseline; add a malformed JSONL test for streaming line-number mapping when time permits.
